recipesJson.name: Gentleman's Chocolate Donut  V1
recipesJson.author: ZeroCool
recipesJson.description: Glazed chocolate donuts with a frosted cream topping and fluffy dough.

reviews.text: This is a damn fine chocolate donut recipe.
Off the shake this taste just like a chocolate glazed donut. I did end up subbing double chocolate for HS Australian chocolate. No offense Wayne but this is better than bronuts.
